body: Super Thumps fucking up to @[sauerkraut] and @Hanford

@Sauerkraut that explain why she was crying when he broke her hymen in the final chapter... seems pretty cruel even though they been doing foreplay all these time. It seems like she forgave him at the end scene.

@Hanferd Yes, but they never had intercourse until (SPOILERS) the last chapter. Even then it's not clear how deep did he go inside the girl. Also, she's mentioned to be in sixth grade of elementary school. I hope someone who's fluent in Japanese can give us the actual plot for it.

So in Summary after checking out from @Sauerkraut post from previous episodes (Damn this artist art sure improved alot). It's about a grown up guy who been with a Elementary schoolgirl he is genuinely in love with but afraid of how society view him, let alone being worried. So they been fucking for years until she is a Middle Schooler. He want to break up with her or that he worried she one day will leave him when she grow older. 

Dunno why he seems to have raped her at the final chapter, maybe she mentioned something? Anyways looks like they are still together as she is waiting for him outside his home.
